00079     /* Makes a copy of the text within the "" that appear after some text 'blahblah'
00080      * i.e. for string 'pose["apples"]' with prefix 'pose[', it should grab "apples"
00081      * 
00082      *  - str: is the entire string to chop
00083      *  - prefix: is the part of the string to leave out 
00084      *
00085      * Assume that the strings returned must be freed afterwards, and that the inputs will contain 
00086      * data we want...
00087      */
00088 char *BLI_getQuotedStr(const char *str, const char *prefix);
